alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:02PM EDT until July 16 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN BOONE COUNTIES... At 702 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Indianapolis, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Warren Park around 705 PM EDT. Lawrence around 710 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 112 and 118, and between mile markers 126 and 127. Interstate 70 between mile markers 83 and 90. Interstate 74 between mile markers 93 and 94. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
